text: Haplocoelopsis is a monotypic plant genus in the family Sapindaceae. The sole species is Haplocoelopsis africana. It is found in Kenya, Tanzania, and possibly Angola. ==References== Category:Flora of Kenya Category:Flora of Tanzania Category:Data deficient plants Category:Monotypic Sapindaceae genera Category:Sapindaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Haplocoelopsis
